title: Bound Print, "Chimneypiece, from Diverse Maniere d'adornare i cammini", 1769
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: Cavaliere Piranesi inv. ed inc.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Gustave Gilbert
description: The image depicts a chimneypiece with female figures and masks decorating the andirons. The jambs consist of Greek keys, masks, and other composite classical symbols. The mantel is decorated at the center with a medusa-like head, flanked by swans and then by satyrs. Above is a frieze of winged putti.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bound Print, "Chimneypiece, from Diverse Maniere d'adornare i cammini", 1769.
1769. Etching on paper. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Gustave Gilbert. 1967-85-24-55.
